_header: Listeneth all I shall you tell / What Matthew says in our gospel
Note: For the text in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4724.
_description: Gospel for Septuagesima in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Lustneþ and I wol ow telleWhat Matheu seiþ in vre
                    gospelle…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…ffor wymmen made him God forsakeAnd to Maumetes worschupe
                    make
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Simile est regnum celorum homini pater familias (f.
                    178va)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Lythis all i sall ȝow tellWhat mathewe sais in þis
                    gospell …
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…ffor wymmen gert him god forsakeAnd to mawmetes wirschipe
                    make
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
HErkenes and I sale ȝowe telleWhat Matheu sais in oure
                    godspelle…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And sithen gart wymmen him forsakeHis god and to maumetes
                    take

CULDd11.First Lines:
LIsteniþ & I wile ȝow telleWhat Matthew seyth in his
                    gospelle…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…ffor women made him god forsake& to mawmetis worschipe
                    make
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Simile est regnum celorum homini patri familias qui exiit primo mane
                        conducere &c. (f. 79)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Lystens and I sall ȝou tellWhat mathew sayes in oure
                    gospell…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…ffor women gert hym god for sakeAnd vnto mawnentry hym
                    take

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
…To a husband þat harly yodeTo hyr werkman at do his
                    dede…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…ffor women gart hym god for sakeAnd to mawmotes wyrchip
                    make
BLAdd38010.Note:
This item is incomplete: it appears that a folio preceding it is
                    missing, because part of the last item is missing (5161-7) and the first four lines of this
                    item are also missing.

HunHM129.First Lines:
Herkyn and I schal ȝow tellWhat seynt matew sayth in oure
                    gospell…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…ffor woman made hym god forsakAnd to mawmentys wyrschop
                    mak

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Lythes now I sall ȝow tellwhat mathew says in oure
                    gospell…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…ffor women gert hym god for sakeand mawmentes wyrchipe for to
                    make
